Author: hsatija1
Title: [ANN] Introducing VuePay... || ICO & Pre-Sales
Body: Introducing VuePay, a peer to peer platform based on Ethereum technology where advertisers target potential customers based preference and demographic variables. Users are notified by matching advertiser settings to the users on the platform and users get rewarded for watching ads. As more users get added onto the platform, machine learning will be used to predict and improve the ad targeting process.  The ecosystem introduces transparency in the ad targeting process by:  - providing transparency to advertisers who watch ads;  - giving power back to users i.e. they only receive notification when ads that meet criteria set by users are published  - paying users a share of the cost per view of ads placed on the platform.  Please view our website at http://vuepay.co Read our whitepaper @ http://vuepay.co/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/VuePay%20whitepaper.pdf  Thanks.  The VuePay Team https://twitter.com/vuepay https://www.linkedin.com/company-beta/13396593/ https://www.facebook.com/VuePayICO/ https://vuepayteam.slack.com/messages/@slackbot/
